ru.curs.lyra.kernel

Class BasicLyraForm<T extends ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.BasicCursor>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.curs.lyra.kernel.BasicLyraForm<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicCardForm, BasicGridForm

    public abstract class BasicLyraForm<T extends ru.curs.celesta.dbutils.BasicCursor>
extends Object
    Base Java class for Lyra forms. Two classes inherited from this one are BasicCardForm and BasicGridForm.
